title: I gifted a skin to my friend and he hasn't gotten it
body: I gifted a friend Junkyard Trundle last night, and he has yet to receive it. Any reasons?

replies.body:
Hey NegaDKR -

Thanks for the report! Could you have your friend check either in champion select, or in the champion detail page to see if the content is unlocked? If the content isn't unlocked, please shoot a ticket to [player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can help you out there!
They won't answer you here, send a support ticket.
